channel.title: Make the client a new window
channel.description: Im trying to figure out when you run the client, which file tell it to pop out into its own window. Is it gameframe, mudclient, gamewindow.

item.title: Make the client a new window
item.dc:creator: @Zach_Knight Zach Knight
item.description:
@Zach_Knight wrote:

[quote=“waj, post:5, topic:551359”][quote author=gawdz666 link=topic=670276.msg4482261#msg4482261 date=1431013461]

exactly as i said above. When you double click on “run client” what file causes the actual client window to open

Well it depends…

The mudclient is the actual game but the applet is what holds the mudclient.

What source are you running on so i can give you the exact classname.

Look at a class that extends Applet and implements Runnable
[/quote]
If he can’t figure out the answer on his own, what are his chances of been able to do what ever he is wanting there?[/quote]
This sort of thinking is kinda harmful. He could legitimately be interested in learning how to program in Java, and while using RSClassic server code for this is a pretty bad idea due to the poor quality of server code in general surrounding this community, he could learn a thing or two in the process, and maybe move on to better things from there.

OP, your question is incredibly vague. We need more information over what it is you want to know and what it is that you’re trying to do.

Read full topic
item.source: Make the client a new window

item.title: Make the client a new window
item.dc:creator: @gawdz666 gawdz666
item.description:
@gawdz666 wrote:

[quote=“waj, post:5, topic:551359”][quote author=gawdz666 link=topic=670276.msg4482261#msg4482261 date=1431013461]

exactly as i said above. When you double click on “run client” what file causes the actual client window to open

Well it depends…

The mudclient is the actual game but the applet is what holds the mudclient.

What source are you running on so i can give you the exact classname.

Look at a class that extends Applet and implements Runnable
[/quote]
If he can’t figure out the answer on his own, what are his chances of been able to do what ever he is wanting there?[/quote]

We all didn’t know shit about the client at 1 point or another.

Also can you explain what you are trying to accomplish?

Read full topic

item.title: Make the client a new window
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

^No I think he wants to know which method makes the client open up in a window, which is the createWindow method which is located in GameWindow which creates the game window frame . But what he might want to achieve is a launcher/loader.

Read full topic

item.title: Make the client a new window

item.description:
@freaky5000 wrote:

Oh, something tells me it’s the loader.class/java. Might be wrong, not looked at the client src in a while.
